messages.subject: Re: Bumperstickers,
messages.msgSnippet: ... No kidding. We had been discussing bumperstickers on the message boards and I went back and told my dh about that one. He made it at makestickers.com and
messages.messageBody:
>>>I have one on my car that says "Free the Children" It has a red
>>>circle/slash with the word school inside. It also has the unschooling.com
>>>addy on it. :o)>>>

>>No kidding?

>>Where'd you get that one - or did you build it yourself?>>

No kidding. We had been discussing bumperstickers on the message boards and
I went back and told my dh about that one. He made it at makestickers.com
and tucked it in my Christmas stocking. It's my favorite.

Life is good.
~Mary

messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Re: Bumperstickers,
messages.msgSnippet: The kidlets have a little redschool house with the circle and slash that reads:  No More Kiddie Prisons. Lynda ... From: zenmomma *
messages.messageBody:
The kidlets have a little redschool house with the circle and slash that
reads: No More Kiddie Prisons.

Lynda
----- Original Message -----
From: "zenmomma *" <zenmomma@...>
To: <Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com>
Sent: Tuesday, April 02, 2002 7:27 AM
Subject: [Unschooling-dotcom] Re: Bumperstickers,


>
>
> >>We were tossing about an idea IRL a while back. We want to make
> copycat bumperstickers that say: "DARE to keep kids off school." We think
> there mught be a copyright problem with it though.
>
> How about an oyster shell that says "The World is My School">>
>
> I have one on my car that says "Free the Children" It has a red
circle/slash
> with the word school inside. It also has the unschooling.com addy on it.
:o)
>
> Life is good.
> ~Mary
>

messages.subject: [Unschooling-dotcom] Re: Bumperstickers,
messages.msgSnippet: ... No kidding? Where d you get that one - or did you build it yourself? Helen
messages.messageBody:
At 8:27 AM -0700 4/2/2002, zenmomma * wrote:
>I have one on my car that says "Free the Children" It has a red circle/slash
>with the word school inside. It also has the unschooling.com addy on it. :o)

No kidding?

Where'd you get that one - or did you build it yourself?

Helen

messages.subject: Re: Bumperstickers,
messages.msgSnippet: ... copycat bumperstickers that say: DARE to keep kids off school. We think there mught be a copyright problem with it though. How about an oyster shell that
messages.messageBody:
>>We were tossing about an idea IRL a while back. We want to make
copycat bumperstickers that say: "DARE to keep kids off school." We think
there mught be a copyright problem with it though.

How about an oyster shell that says "The World is My School">>

I have one on my car that says "Free the Children" It has a red circle/slash
with the word school inside. It also has the unschooling.com addy on it. :o)

Life is good.
~Mary
